author: Brad Colbow
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com
iPad Air M3 (affiliate link) https://amzn.to/4iodvWc

The new M3 iPad Air is a lot like the M2 iPad Air Apple released last year and that's not a bad thing. I think this is the best iPad in terms of value. It's much higher quality than the entry level iPad but less expensive than the bells and whistles iPad Pro.

You might still be able to get the old M2 iPad Air at a discount:
Amazon: https://amzn.to/4iodvWc
Best Buy: https://go.magik.ly/ml/2anps/
